titleStmt.title: A Declaration of several officers of the army in Ireland, on behalf of themselves and those under their commands holding forth their stedfast resolutions to adhere to the Parliament in defence of its priviledges, and the just rights and libertyes of the people of these nations as men and Christians.

A Declaration of several officers of the army in Ireland, on behalf of themselves and those under their commands holding forth their stedfast resolutions to adhere to the Parliament in defence of its priviledges, and the just rights and libertyes of the people of these nations as men and Christians.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn and faded with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Worcester College Library, Oxford University.
